name.description: A friendly name for the voicemail box

owner_id.description: The ID of the user object that 'owns' the voicemail box

pin.description: The pin number for the voicemail box

require_pin.description: Determines if a pin is required to check the voicemail from the users devices

check_if_owner.description: Determines if when the user calls their own voicemail they should be prompted to sign in

is_setup.description: Determines if the user has completed the initial configuration

skip_greeting.description: Determines if the greeting should be skipped

skip_instructions.description: Determines if the instructions after the greeting and prior to composing a message should be played

unavailable.description: The ID of a media object that should be used as the unavailable greeting

notifications.description: The notifications parameters for this account

voicemail_to_email.description: The voicemail to email notification parameters for this account

email_text_template.description: The email html body template.  Has access to an acccount, service, and voicemail object

email_html_template.description: The email text body template.  Has access to an acccount, service, and voicemail object

email_subject_template.description: The email subject template.  Has access to an acccount, service, and voicemail object

support_number.description: The support number provided to the templates

support_email.description: The support email provided to the templates

service_url.description: The support number provided to the templates

send_from.description: The from address used when sending the email

messages.description: The messages that have been left in the voicemail box

timestamp.description: The UTC timestamp, in gregorian seconds, that the voicemail was left on

folder.description: The folder the message belongs to

media_id.description: The ID of the message media object
